title: It's A Beautiful Day
lyrics:
[Intro] (C) (C) (G) (G7)

[Verse]                        
(C)I don't know (G)why you think that (Am)you could hold me 
When you (F)couldn't get by by (C)yourself 
And I don't know (G)who would ever want to (Am)tear the seam of (F)someone's dream    (C)
Baby, it's (G)fine, you said that we should (Am)just be friends 
Well I came (F)up with that line and I'm (C)sure 
That it's for the (G)best 
If you ever (Am)change your mind, don't (F)hold your breath 

[Pre-chorus]
'Cause (Am)you may not (E)believe, (E7)mmmm 
That (Am)baby, I'm (E)relieved    (E7)
When (F)you said goodbye, my (G)whole world shined  
(G)Hey hey (C)hey!

[Chorus]
(C)It's a beautiful (G)day and I can't (Am)stop myself from (G)smiling 
If we're (F)drinking, then I'm (C)buying 
And I (F)know there's no (C)denying (G) (C)
It's a beautiful (G)day, the sun is (Am)up, the music's (G)playing 
And even (F)if it started (C)raining
You won't (F)hear this boy (C)complaining 
'Cause I'm (F)glad that you're the (E7)one that got (Am)away    (G)
It's a beautiful (C)day 

[Verse]
(C)It's my turn to (G)fly, so girls, get in (Am)line 
'Cause I'm easy, no (F)playing this guy like a (C)fool 
Now I'm (G)alright, you might've had me (Am)caged before, but (F)not tonight 

[Pre-chorus]
And (Am)you may not (E)believe, (E7)mmmmm
That (Am)baby, I'm (E)relieved    (E7)
This (F)fire inside, it (G)burns too bright 
I don't want to (F)say "so long", I just want to (G)say "goodbye"     

[Chorus]
(C)It's a beautiful (G)day and I can't (Am)stop myself from (G)smiling 
If we're (F)drinking, then I'm (C)buying 
And I (F)know there's no (C)denying (G) (C)
It's a beautiful (G)day, the sun is (Am)up, the music's (G)playing 
And even (F)if it started (C)raining
You won't (F)hear this boy (C)complaining 
'Cause I'm (F)glad that you're the (E7)one who got (Am)away,  (G)mmmmm
'Cause if you (F)ever think I'll (C)take up
My time with (F)thinking of our (C)break-up 
Then you've (F)got another (E7)thing coming your (Am)way    (G)(single strum)

'Cause it's a beautiful (C)day
